title: Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: ['4 large potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 large onion, finely chopped, divided', '120g grated Cheddar cheese, divided', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 carrots, peeled and diced', '450g minced lamb (preferably local)', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '200ml lamb stock']
